$schema.description: May refere to the schema file to enable auto-fill and validation in some editors.

REQUEST_OPTION.description: Request helper options for internal requests.

KEEP_ALIVE.description: Add Keep-Alive header to the request connection.

CORS.description: If enabled, default content security policy (CSP) header will be set.

SECURITY_HEADERS.description: If enabled, additional security header will be set.

GLOBAL_LOGIN_ANNOUNCEMENT.description: global announcement, shown as notification in header on startpage when not loggedin.

GLOBAL_ANNOUNCEMENT_ADMIN_TEACHER.description: global announcement, shown only to administrator and teacher

GLOBAL_ANNOUNCEMENT.description: global announcement, shown as notification in header on startpage

LOGIN_BLOCKED_COOKIES_NOTE.default: Bitte aktiviere Cookies für diese Seite. Andernfalls ist ein Login aus technischen Gründen nicht möglich.
LOGIN_BLOCKED_COOKIES_NOTE.description: text that is shown above the login form if cookies are blocked by the browser.

FEATURE_CSRF_ENABLED.description: Enables CSRF Token generation and error handler in app.

FEATURE_MORGAN_LOG_ENABLED.description: If enabled, morgan logs are written.

FEATURE_SKIP_FIRST_LOGIN_ENABLED.description: If enabled, firstLogin page is not shown.

FEATURE_LOG_REQUEST.description: Enables the log of req data like request body

MORGAN_LOG_FORMAT.description: Sets the morgan log level. Morgan is creating access logs for express.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Sets the winston log level. Winston is used for all logs. @see AbstractConfigSetLevels

TEACHER_VISIBILITY_FOR_EXTERNAL_TEAM_INV.description: Defines wether external team invitation shows teachers from different schools or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by user required.

STUDENT_TEAM_CREATION.description: defines wether students may create teams or not. if enabled system wide there are options general enabled or opt-in/-out by school admin required.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

FEATURE_VIDEOCONFERENCE_WAITING_ROOM_ENA.description: If enabled, adds video conferences to teams and courses.

FEATURE_ASSET_CACHING_ENABLED.description: If enabled, static assets will be fingerprinted and cached.

ASSET_CACHING_MAX_AGE_SECONDS.description: Max-Age for static assets response header. Defaults to one day.

NOT_AUTHENTICATED_REDIRECT_URL.description: The URL to authenticate. Unauthenticated users are redirected to this URL with ?redirect= pointing to the original request URL

FEATURE_JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_ENABLED.description: Using privateDevice parameter in login, the logout/jwt timeout can be extended to JWT_EXTENDED_TIMEOUT_SECONDS instead of JWT_TIMEOUT_SECONDS.

SC_CONTACT_EMAIL.description: Contact E-Mail Address to The HPI School-Cloud team.

MATRIX_MESSENGER.description: Matrix messenger properties, required always to be defined

URI.description: The URI of the Matrix Messenger server.

EMBED_URI.description: Where to find the messenger dependencies.

STUDENT_ROOM_CREATION.description: If enabled, school admins can allow students to create additional chat rooms

SCHOOL_SETTINGS_VISIBLE.description: Only if enabled, school admins can activate the messenger in their school setting

SCHOOL_ROOM_ENABLED.description: If enabled, school admins can choose to create a room for all students and teachers of the school

NO_COLOR.description: The value is used to disable logging color in terminal and is set in production always to true. It is not connected to the loggers it self.

FEATURE_MATRIX_MESSENGER_ENABLED.description: If enabled, adds support for matrix messenger

FEATURE_ALERTS_ENABLED.description: If enabled, user will see messages/incidents from e.g status.dbildungscloud

ALERT_STATUS_URL.description: The url of status message provider (should end without a slash).

GHOST_API_KEY.description: Content API Key of ghost blog

GHOST_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of ghost blog (should end without a slash)

OAUTH2_LOGOUT_URI.description: API URI of Oauth2 Logout (should end without a slash)

IS_CONFIGURABLE.description: Allows school admin to toggle teachers' STUDENT_LIST permission.

FEATURE_ADMIN_TOGGLE_STUDENT_LERNSTORE_V.description: Allows school admin to toggle student's LERNSTORE_VIEW permission.

FEATURE_SCHOOL_POLICY_ENABLED.description: Custom School Policy can be uploaded by the school admin

ETHERPAD.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined

SKIP_CONDITIONS_CONSENT.description: A string with concatenated user types (student, employee) that don't need to explicitly state their consent with the terms and conditions. "employee" means teachers and admins

COOKIE.description: Cookie properties, required always to be defined

SAME_SITE.description: Value for cookies sameSite property. When SECURE flag is false, 'None' is not allowed in SAME_SITE and Lax should be used as default instead

COOKIE_SECRET.description: Secret used to sign the session ID cookie

LOGIN_BLOCK_TIME.description: Number of second the user will be blocked before logging in again

FEATURE_LERNSTORE_ENABLED.description: Defines if backend for the Lern-Store link in sidebar is enabled.

FEATURE_TSP_AUTO_CONSENT_ENABLED.description: Feature toggle for automatic consent during TSP sync.

ROCKETCHAT_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: feature toggle to activate rocketchat for the instance.

ROCKET_CHAT_DEPRECATION_DATE.description: if this is set, rocketchat will be treated as disabled after this date.

FALLBACK_LANGUAGE.description: Value for the fallback language if translation key is not found

DEBUG.description: Enable i18n logging to console, e.g. missing translation keys

FEATURE_PROMETHEUS_ENABLED.description: Feature flag to enable prometheus api metrics

PROMETHEUS.description: Prometheus metrics options used by prometheus-api-metrics

COLLECT_DEFAULT_METRICS.description: include default nodejs (heap-/eventloop/...) and process related metrics

INCLUDE_STATUS_CODE.description: include http status code for http_request_duration_seconds metric

INCLUDE_METHOD.description: include http method type for http_request_duration_seconds metric

INCLUDE_PATH.description: include path with id's replaced for http_request_duration_seconds metric

METRIC_TYPE.description: metric types supported for http_request_duration_seconds metric

CALENDAR_DASHBOARD_ENABLED.description: If true calendar events are displayed on the dashboard. Otherwise the request is skipped.

CALENDAR_SERVICE_ENABLED.description: To start the application with calendar service.

FEATURE_TASK_COPY_ENABLED.description: Feature toggle activate new task copy service.

FEATURE_NUXT_SCHOOL_ADMIN_BETA.description: Enables button to new Nuxt School Admin beta-version page

FEATURE_TEAMS_INVITE_EXTERNAL_ENABLED.description: Enables button for invitations of external experts within teams

FEATURE_USER_MIGRATION_ENABLED.description: If enabled, admin can see a message with link to user migration page

FEATURE_DASHBOARD_DEFAULT_PICTURE_ENABLE.description: Enables the default picture of the dashboard

FEATURE_DASHBOARD_NEWS_ON_TOP_ENABLED.description: Enables the order of the dashboard with the news on top

FEATURE_NEXTCLOUD_TEAM_FILES_ENABLED.description: Enables button on team file pages to open the nextcloud file storage.

NEXTCLOUD_REDIRECT_URL.description: URL that leads to the nextcloud oauth login

FILES_STORAGE.description: Files storage server properties, required always to be defined

SERVICE_BASE_URL.description: The URI of the file service

INCOMING_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout for incoming requests to the File-Storage in milliseconds.

MAX_FILE_SIZE.description: File size of incoming requests to the File-Storage in MB.
